Description: Pottery ostracon: two fragments re-joined. The text comprises a letter written in Coptic.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Henri Édouard Naville (1893-94, on behalf of EEF)
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (390759) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/390759)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Crum 209 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
